review: I received this item a few days ago and after about of week I can say I will no longer be using this. It's really easy to set up and would be great if it was more stable. I have high speed internet my router is no more then about 3 feet away from my TV and yet Amazon fire stick is always freezing and crashing. Never happened with my Apple TV at all. I can barely watch an entire show let alone a music video without it buffering in the middle or freezing up completely. I gave it two stars because it shipped speedy and packaging was great. And over it would be a great item the menus and everything are really awesome. It's just a really unstable source to be able to enjoy.
